description: Convolution of A000108 (Catalan numbers) with A040075.
comments: Also convolution of A045492 with A000984 (central binomial coefficients); also convolution of A042985 with A000302 (powers of 4).
formula: a(n) = binomial(n+5, 4)*(4^(n+1) - A000984(n+5)/A000984(4))/2, A000984(n)=binomial(2*n, n); G.f. c(x)/(1-4*x)^5, where c(x) = g.f. for Catalan numbers.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
